title: Modeling Non-Equilibrium Processes with Neural CDEs
content: Trained a Neural Controlled Differential Equations

title: Representation Engineering
content: Implemented LoRRA with contrast vector loss for the Mistra-7B Instruct LLM in PyTorch. Incorporated reading vectors and task-specific contrast vectors to influence the model's representation of truthful vs. untruthful information from the TruthfulQA dataset

title: Invariant GNN for Molecular Property Prediction
content: Project for physics-inspired deep learning class Implemented and trained a version of the SchNet E(3) invariant graph neural network in PyTorch and cross-validation with Scikit-learn for predicting molecular properties on the QM7 dataset

title: N-dimensional Ising Model Simulation
content: Implementation of the Ising Model for magnetization using NumPy and SciPy Simulates the evolution of an N-dimensional lattice of spins under controlled thermal fluctuations and an external magnetic field

title: Pintos OS
content: Group project for operating systems and systems programming class Implemented a Linux-inspired x86 kernel with support for multithreading and thread synchronization, virtual memory management, a FAT-based file system, and kernel/user programs Written in C and x86 assembly

title: Gitlet
content: Project for data structures class, written entirely in Java. Lite version of Linus Torvaldâ€™s Git version-control system that allows for the creation of locally-stored repositories with support for repo branching, merging to solve conflicts, and updating files.
